comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content: Evaristo Madero Elizondo married to Rafaela Hernández Lombraña who gave birth to Francisco Madero Hernández (or Sr) [the man at left] who married to Mercedes González Treviño that were parents of the late president of Mexico, Francisco I(gnacio) Madero González. You can see a picture of him here in Bain's collection www.loc.gov/pictures/resource/ggbain.12568/ The Library of Congress, digital prints and photographs www.loc.gov/pictures/item/99471840/ and www.loc.gov/pictures/item/97508873/ among others. Ernesto was Ministro de Hacienda (Minister of Finance) to Francisco Madero Jr. presidency Dr. Roberto Duarte
